entry.title: Born to Run
entry.summary:
Author: Whiteandroidy

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,291Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 171

Summary: Buck was kidnapped by a serial killer while he was still at odds with the 118 over a lawsuit -------Pain stopped being something that happened to Buck. It became a state. At some point — he couldn’t tell when — his body stopped reacting the way it used to. The sharp edges dulled. The flinching disappeared. His muscles still screamed when the weight pulled on his shoulders, when circulation cut off and returned in burning waves, but his mind no longer followed the signals all the way through.

entry.title: The World Was On Fire, And No One Could Save Me But You...
entry.summary:
Author: InterrogateTheCat

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,108Chapters: 2/10Kudos: 60

Summary: Post LAWSUIT. Buck was given up by the Buckley parents, once Daniel died. He was given to Prescott Academy, a place they trained children to be assissians, they teach them at a young age. He left and became inactive in his early twenties, and became a firefighter instead. He kept his past to himself. That is until Hardman, his academy trainer shows up at the firehouse saying Agent 83 (Megan) has been taken, along with her husband Roger. Buck must keep Agent 83's (Megan) daughter safe. Buck gets reactived (Agent 81) to the mission, to find Agent 83, who was also his best friend since the academy. (You don't need to watch Barely Lethal to read this. I'll give enough context)

entry.title: Second Chances
entry.summary:
Author: starylighting

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 639,474Chapters: 68/?Kudos: 88

Summary: Bobby and Athena are just two people trying to put their lives back together while figuring out how to co-parent. What starts as a complicated plan to foster kids in need slowly turns into something much deeper. Through the ups and downs of heartbreak, healing, and raising children who’ve been through so much, they find strength in each other. Over time, their partnership grows into love, and together, they build a story about family, trust, and second chances.

entry.title: Evergrowing
entry.summary:
Author: starylighting

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 427,103Chapters: 61/?Kudos: 26

Summary: Athena and Bobby are learning that parenting doesn’t end when the kids turn eighteen. With three grown children and two still at home, Bobby and Athena find themselves navigating new challenges at every stage of life. Each child carries their own struggles, some spoken and some hidden, but together the family works through the ups and downs with love, patience, and resilience. At the heart of it all, they’re reminded that family is a bond that grows, shifts, and deepens, no matter how old the kids get.

entry.title: The Price of Power
entry.summary:
Author: starylighting

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 263,125Chapters: 44/?Kudos: 23

Summary: Athena Carter and Bobby Nash couldn’t be more different. She’s the disciplined “good girl” with her future mapped out, while he’s the dangerous bad boy with one foot in college and the other in the streets. When their worlds start to collide, what begins as a bitter rivalry quickly sparks into something deeper neither of them can ignore. But falling for Bobby means stepping into a world Athena never imagined, one ruled by loyalty and violence. That tested everything she thought she knew about herself. As sparks turn to fire, Athena must decide if love is worth the risk of losing everything.

entry.title: Some Things Never Change
entry.summary:
Author: chittatoez

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,338Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 22

Summary: He slowly rubs his son’s back, “C-Chris? What are you doing?” His eyes sting and his heart beats rapidly. He can feel Chris shift a little, leaning on Eddie’s shoulder. “Hugging you” Chris answers simply. “Why?” “Cause I think you need it.” His eighteen-year-old son initiated affection. This is not real. This can’t be real. Or Chris is going to college soon and Eddie is having a hard time dealing with it. Or That once people said: "Everything is about Buddie except for Buddie which is about Christopher."

entry.title: Buck, Ballroom-ed and Bewildered
entry.summary:
Author: eutony_majime

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 20,694Chapters: 4/13Kudos: 67

Summary: Before the host could continue talking about “Mr. Sexy Fireman” any more, Eddie’s phone buzzed. He looked down, and his stomach clenched. ‘Producer Katy’. “Shit,” Eddie said, grabbing at his phone. “C’mere, you stupid thing.” Finally, he got a grip and answered the phone. “Yo, Katy! Any news yet?” “Yes, actually. I think we got someone for you.” OR Evan “Buck” Buckley, a young firefighter from LAFD 118, soars into fame after his daring rescue of a young woman was filmed and went viral on social media. When a Dancing with the Stars producer walks into the station with an offer, Buck is introduced to the world of ballroom dance. His partner is certainly not who he expects… Eddie Diaz is entering his 4th season of being a pro on Dancing with the Stars with little success with his previous partners. After being eliminated in Week 5 last season, Eddie is ready to finally make it to the finals. So when he gets a note from the producers saying that they found him a partner, Eddie expects a gymnast or a model, or someone like that… not a devastatingly handsome firefighter…

entry.title: It makes me nauseous
entry.summary:
Author: Whatdawnknows

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,233Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 97

Summary: The drive back to the station was short, but much rougher than the ride out. Buck felt like his brain had been shaken loose and was rattling around in his skull. He leaned against the window to try to stop the pounding in his head. He didn’t deserve to feel this upset over Chris. He wasn’t Chris’ father. And anyway, Christopher was fine! Everyone was fine. Nothing had really happened, in the end, except a dead phone battery and a little good old-fashioned teenage rebellion. The constant jostling was messing with his stomach, too. He could feel every bump and swerve in his gut, roiling and churning with mounting intensity. Cold sweat pricked at his skin. Eddie definitely didn’t want Buck to come over, or he would have said so. Buck had gotten used to thinking of Eddie and Chris as his family, but they hadn’t been like that in months, had they? No, longer. Not since Chris left for Texas, really. It had been too long, it was too late. Bile rose in his throat and he choked it back down.   OR: Buck definitely does not have the flu, he’s just sad about Eddie and Chris

entry.title: what we might do
entry.summary:
Author: freak4freakbuddie (cqfnce)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,392Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 41

Summary: Buck snorts. “Don’t know if you can count Buck version one in my career. Could be used against me, even. Hey- if you were captain, and I stole the firetruck-”“I’d-” Eddie starts, and then cuts himself off. That blush from before returns, even as he stubbornly keeps his eyes on the road. Buck feels his eyebrows raise, and his mind starts to really tick in interest. “I’d handle it.”“You’d handle me,” Buck drops his voice to a whisper, leans over the center console. “Could show you what I used it for. Captain.”“You talk a big game,” Eddie says. He’s recovered somewhat, even with Buck still close. “But when I said no one would notice if we went to the storage closet-”or, buck and eddie and the wonders of undernegotiated roleplay

entry.title: Never Be Alone
entry.summary:
Author: danniphant

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,065Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 76

Summary: “So you’re telling us they had a brother named Daniel, who died as a child?” Hen asked. “And then a sister named Danielle?” Eddie continued. “Who was named after the same brother Daniel who died? Yes.” Chimney stated. There was a long uncomfortable pause as the two processed the information that was given to them. “That’s a little fucked up.” Hen finally said, shaking her head. OR Buck and Maddie have a little sister who's been missing for a decade…more or less.

entry.title: Homebound
entry.summary:
Author: jujububu159

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,822Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 25

Summary: At first, Eddie’s concern eased - maybe Buck’s phone had died and he had gone to meet Maddie. But all hope left him when he opened the note: I’m fine, don’t worry about me.I’ll be okay. Eddie’s heart raced. What did Buck mean, “I’ll be okay”? Of course he was okay—he was with Chris and Eddie. ORBuck is spiraling and needs out, he needs to fill the empty space that was left when Bobby passed. He takes a more drastic approach to this leaving Eddie trying to find a way to make Buck see that what he is missing is in front of him, in LA.

entry.title: Leaving and Growing Up
entry.summary:
Author: ratking_withnotail

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 183,468Chapters: 15/?Kudos: 915

Summary: Percy Jackson was excited—genuinely excited—for the first time in what felt like years. A new city. A new name. A new face, even. The golden hair, the pale blue eyes, the tattoos that traced his skin like constellations—none of it screamed “Percy Jackson” anymore. He was Evan Buckley now, or just Buck, depending on who asked. He’d keep busy—physically exhausted, mentally occupied, emotionally detached. That was the key. No attachments. No friendships. No relationships. No vulnerability. He’d learned the hard way that getting close to people only ended in pain. Either they died, betrayed him, or saw the legend behind the name and stopped seeing him altogether. Unfortunately, he hadn’t planned on the 118.

entry.title: Catch Me, Please
entry.summary:
Author: ALittleSideProject

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 46,685Chapters: 13/34Kudos: 144

Summary: And all of that was why, on their seventeenth day on Mars, Buck had shoved Eddie out of the way during the emergency evacuation, knowing it meant his own death instead of Eddie’s. Buck trusted Eddie to help get everyone else home, and Eddie had someone to go home for. Someone who needed him and loved him. Someone who Buck loved, even without ever meeting. He wasn’t going to let Chris grow up without a father. So in the split second he had to think after seeing the communications dish flying at them through the storm that was chasing them off the planet fourteen days early, he’d pushed Eddie out of the way, hoping like hell it would be enough and knowing he wouldn’t live long enough to find out. -- Or, when their mission to Mars goes wrong, Buck gets stranded and the rest of the crew does everything they can to save him. | Fic is complete at ~120k words and posting 2-3x a week as I edit.
